title: Most Candidates Running on Crime Don’t Have Much Power to Solve It
description: Your congressman doesn’t control the police budget. Your senator probably doesn’t know where the worst hot spots are.
dc:creator: Emily Badger
media:credit: Ian Maule/Tulsa World, via Associated Press
media:description: A police investigation of a possible murder-suicide that left eight people dead near Tulsa last week. Oklahoma has higher violent crime rates than California.
